dialogue.introduction: I am Tone! With my addition to the fleet, there will be no problems searching out the enemy!
dialogue.library_intro: The last completed heavy cruiser of the Japanese Navy, oldest sister of the Tone-class, Tone. At Pearl Harbor and Midway, as the eye for the fleet, I unceasingly watched the length and breadth of the ocean. I ended out the war protecting the Kure Naval Yards as a floating fortress, fighting until my blades were broken, arrows were depleted.
dialogue.secretary3: Admiral, you appear to have copious free time? Battle preparations and logistics are important, are they not?
dialogue.secretaryidle: N-no! I'm not... It's not like i'm bored or anything!
dialogue.wedding: That's right, my scouts have found the enemy fleet!! ...Eh? Enough of that? ...Then what is it? What is this?
dialogue.show_players_score: A communique has arrived. Shall you be confirming it?
dialogue.equipment2: You have my thanks... Compared to that Chikuma, I became stronger again!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Yes. Indeed. Frequent refits bring about triumphs!
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Grr.... Even I get tired. For now... to sleep!
dialogue.docking_complete: The ship is fully repaired. That's a relief.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: Operation complete. The fleet has returned.
dialogue.air_battle: No, not yet..! I will never lose to Chikuma! (Kai Ni)
dialogue.attack: No way, you say the catapult is in bad condition?
dialogue.night_battle: Did you think you could escape from my scouts!?
dialogue.night_attack: Not yet, not yet..! I won't lose to Chikuma!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: Not yet, not yet..! I won't lose to Chikuma!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: Not yet, not yet..! I won't lose to Chikuma!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: Not yet, not yet..! I won't lose to Chikuma!
dialogue.mvp: As long as I'm here, it's victory as expected! Because I am "the" older sister, compared to that Chikuma!
dialogue.moderately_damaged: Direct hit!? ...I shall not sink with merely this!
dialogue.sunk: I have blundered...! I am sinking, no? The siesta of a million years...
dialogue.rainy_season_2015: There are a lot of snails on the fence! That's quite a scene. Wha? You say they are eating the fence? Now, really?!
dialogue.early_summer_2015: Ugh... It's getting hot. I hate/(dislike) the heat. Chikuma. Chikuma~! Ice cream... Ramune...
dialogue.fall_2015: It's the autumn harvest. With so many delicious treats. I am someone who just eats sauries whole. Agh, a fishbone... Chikuma! Chikuma!
dialogue.christmas_2015: Chikuma, this is a Western festival. The cake and cuisines are totally amazing. I'm having fun too!
dialogue.end_of_year_2015: Chikuma, the cleaning is over already. Even sprawling around is troublesome. I want to quickly eat soba.
dialogue.new_year_2016: It's dawn of (a new) year! Happy New Year, Admiral! Let's make this year a great one too!
dialogue.setsubun_2016: How come I have to be the demon!? ...hm, it's because I'm the older sister? No way around it then, I suppo-Ow! Who was that!!?
